Warren taps deep pockets

Senate candidate Elizabeth Warren collected more itemized contributions in New York and Los Angeles than any other city, including Boston, from April to June, according to her latest campaign finance report. (Boston Globe)

law is largely stalled

be open about mental health

Scientist’s game helps map the brain

An MIT professor and his team launched EyeWire, an online game that invites volunteer “scientists” to build maps of the cell networks that are crucial for vision.

Waterfall-like rain eases in Japan, but 28 dead
